author: boston.com
title: Here are the oar insignia of all 15 Mass. colleges participating in Head of the Charles this weekend - Sports
text:
The Boston Globe Fifteen Massachusetts-based colleges are participating in the 51st annual Head of the Charles Regatta in Cambridge. Each have a team or teams duking it out for titles and setting themselves apart on the river with oars emblazoned with school-specific logos.
Prepare yourself to watch this weekend’s race by learning withe oar insignia of each of Massachusetts team–you will want to be able to easily recognize them as they zip down the Charles.
